arunreddy\_ - (21/05/2009 15:17): sdumitriu : Hi

sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 15:31): HI arunreddy\_

jk\_work joined #xwiki at 16:29  
tuska left at 16:30 ("Ex-Chat")  
anamarias left at 16:36 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 16:37  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 16:43): hmm....  I'm having an interesting problem with 1.9-m1, our site has basic auth on it (handled by apache2 - labelled as "restricted area").   Normal basic auth is working for the site, but whenever I go to Wiki Link in the GWT editor, I am being prompted to answer a basic auth challenge for "XWiki"  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 16:43): that seems to be the only part of the site challenging for an "XWiki" basic auth  
sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 16:44): Can you report a bug?  
sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 16:44): jira.xwiki.org  
arunreddy\_ - (21/05/2009 16:45): XWIKI-3468  
arunreddy\_ - (21/05/2009 16:45): sdumitriu: Have submitted the patch long back.   
arunreddy\_ - (21/05/2009 16:45): but still its not closed.  
arunreddy\_ - (21/05/2009 16:45): any problem with the patch  
sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 16:45): Yes, I know  
sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 16:46): I have to look at it  
sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 16:46): When I have some time  
arunreddy\_ - (21/05/2009 16:49): sure , thanks  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 16:50): will do  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 16:53): hmm... it looks like it might be related to http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-2677  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 16:55): maybe not...  it's more to do with just link selection, not sure if that is GWT  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 16:56): is the wiki link dialog considered part of the GWT editor?  
sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 16:56): Yes  
anamarias left at 17:40 ()  
lucaa - (21/05/2009 18:07): jk\_work: it is related to the rest calls that the page explorer used for the link dialogs needs to make to get the xwiki data.  
sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 18:07): Oh, yes  
sdumitriu - (21/05/2009 18:07): And our REST doesn't work with BASIC auth yet  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 18:07): kk so then that JIRA covers it  
lucaa - (21/05/2009 18:08): can you try to go to the <your-wiki>/xwiki/bin/view/Main/AllDocs page and click the Tree view to see if it works?  
lucaa - (21/05/2009 18:08): (it's the same tree explored)  
lucaa - (21/05/2009 18:08): tree explorer  
lucaa - (21/05/2009 18:08): however, if you get passed REST, it's going to be a problem with GWT-RPC calls anyway  
lucaa - (21/05/2009 18:09): in the wysiwyg  
lucaa - (21/05/2009 18:09): anytime the wysiwyg will need data from the server, XWIKI-2677 will happen  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 18:12): trying it now...  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 18:12): yeah, same thing happens in alldocs -> tree  
jk\_work - (21/05/2009 18:13): Basic auth popup for "XWiki"  
lucaa - (21/05/2009 18:14): yes, it's the REST
